source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_00<tab>Shallow Moor has a job for a certain adventurer.
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_00<tab>ペリスタイルのシャロー・ムアーは、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_01<tab>The gleaners have received an odd job with your name on it─literally. The alchemist Pasasun, writing on behalf of the fisherman Matsya, has asked for help in extricating his friend from a spot of unspecified trouble. Shallow Moor informs you that the alchemist can likely be found at the Great Work, if and when you decide to answer his call to action.
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_01<tab>シャロー・ムアーと話した。サベネア島のデミールの遺烈郷で「パサスーン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_02<tab>Pasasun wastes no time in bringing you to Matsya, upon whose head is perched a mysterious bird fluent in the common tongue. Kalika, as he names himself, hails from an isle to the south known as Aloalo, which has long been a verdant paradise home to many animals and men both. However, in the wake of the inhabitants' abrupt departure a century ago, the animals have been free to eat and breed unchecked, and now hordes of ravenous beasts threaten to destroy the balance of nature. Thus did Kalika brave the ocean waves to seek a hunter brave and true─a hero he proclaims to be none other than Matsya. Matsya, unsurprisingly, begs to differ, and entreats you to accompany him on an expedition to Aloalo. You agree, and so Pasasun goes to charter a boat that will deliver you to the island, and bids you meet him in Yedlihmad once you are ready to depart.
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_02<tab>パサスーンたちと話した。マトシャとともにアロアロ島へ行くことになった。サベネア島のイェドリマンで「パサスーン」と再度話そう。

source:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_03<tab>Pasasun informs you that a trio of bandits stole a ship from the Yedlihmad docks shortly before your arrival. While it was not the vessel the alchemist commissioned─and thus its loss shall not hinder your plans─the timing of the theft is curious indeed. Regardless, you must turn your attention to Aloalo and the coming journey with your fisherman-turned-hero companion.

※Aloalo Island can be accessed via the V&C Dungeon Finder.
※To open the V&C Dungeon Finder, speak with the Yedlihmad skipper or select the option located under Duty in the main menu.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_03<tab>パサスーンと話した。「アロアロ島」を攻略しよう。

※ヴァリアントダンジョンの専用ウィンドウから攻略に参加できます。
※専用ウィンドウは、イェドリマンの船頭と話すか、メインコマンドの「コンテンツ情報」から「特殊ダンジョン探索」を選ぶと確認できます。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_04<tab>You brave the verdant wilds of Aloalo, illuminating its secrets and redressing the natural balance. Now that you have returned from your journey, you may seek out Pasasun in Yedlihmad to share with him your experiences on the south sea isle.
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_04<tab>アロアロ島を攻略した。イェドリマンで「パサスーン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_05<tab>Pasasun is overjoyed to receive you and Matsya, and you regale him with the tale of your exciting expedition. Though the Arkasodara found the adventure rewarding in the end, he is nevertheless relieved to be home once more...until Kalika observes that a single hunt will not suffice to keep the beasts in check. The Speaker's servant implores you both to visit the isle many times more─and indeed, the unexplored remainder and resilient fauna ensure that Pasasun will be busy taking notes for many days to come. But before you embark upon your next expedition, it is only prudent that you report your success to Shallow Moor.
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_05<tab>パサスーンたちと話した。オールド・シャーレアンのペリスタイルで「シャロー・ムアー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_06<tab>Shallow Moor listens to your story with rapt interest, unable to suppress a smile when you speak of Matsya's quest to find fish for Nidhana. She congratulates you on a job well done and encourages you to return to Aloalo Island, for the sake of both alchemical knowledge and unrequited love.
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SEQ_06<tab>シャロー・ムアーと話した。アロアロ島には、薬効豊かな魚が釣れる場所がまだあるらしい。ニッダーナへの贈り物を釣りたいというマトシャの願いに応え、再び島へ同行するのもいいだろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! In the mood for an odd job, are we? Your arrival is most fortuitous, for I received a request for <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> assistance but a moment ago.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、いらっしゃい！
あなた宛ての「変則依頼」が来てるわよ～！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_001<tab>It was written by Pasasun, a Thavnairian alchemist, on behalf of an acquaintance of yours. What was his name, again...?
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_001<tab>依頼主は、サベネア島で錬金術師をしているパサスーンさん。
聞いた話だと、彼のお友達があなたの知り合いらしいんだけど……

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_002<tab>...Ah, yes, Matsya! Rings familiar, I hope?
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_002<tab>漁師のマトシャさんって、わかる？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_003<tab>Good, good. It seems your fisher friend is in a spot of trouble, and this Pasasun believes you're the one to get him out of it. That is, of course, assuming you have room in your schedule.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_003<tab>その彼がね、ちょ～っと厄介な悩みを抱えてるらしくて、
パサスーンさんは、あなたを頼れないかって考えたみたい。
どう、協力をお願いしてもいい～？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_Q1_000_004<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_Q1_000_004<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_A1_000_001<tab>I would gladly help a friend in need, especially one to whom I'm indebted.
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_A1_000_001<tab>マトシャには世話になったから、引き受けよう

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_A1_000_002<tab>He doesn't want me to peddle his wares again, does he...?
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_A1_000_002<tab>魚の販路にでも困ってるのかな……

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_005<tab>That's a “yes,” then! Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_005<tab>そう言ってくれてよかった～っ！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_006<tab>I really couldn't say, though I would have thought a merchant with <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> backing could sell ice crystals to fire sprites.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_006<tab>それなら商人を頼ったほうがよさそうだけど、
あなたの顔の広さに期待されているとか……？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_007<tab>While I myself am not familiar with the details of the request, Pasasun should be happy to explain everything. I believe he can be found in the Great Work.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_007<tab>私も詳しいことは把握できてないから、
まずは「パサスーン」さんと話してみて！
デミールの遺烈郷へ行けば彼と会えるはずよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_008<tab>May the job prove free of hitches, hindrances, and headaches!
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_008<tab>それじゃあ、いってらっしゃ～い！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_010<tab>Oh, you must be <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Have the gleaners sent you here?
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_010<tab>ああ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
もしかして、グリーナーの方から話を聞いて……？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_011<tab>Very good. You have no idea how relieved I am that you've come.
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_011<tab>よかった、来てくれて嬉しいよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_012<tab>As you may have guessed, I am Pasasun. I work as an alchemist here at the Great Work, and Matsya is one of my oldest and dearest friends.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_012<tab>改めまして、僕の名前はパサスーン。
この遺烈郷で働いている錬金術師で、
マトシャとは古い友人なんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_013<tab>His is a problem which has proven quite difficult to unravel. Nevertheless, he is loath to ask you for help...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_013<tab>聞いていると思うけど、彼が厄介な悩みを抱えていてね……
本人は忙しいあなたを頼るのを避けたがっていたけど、
僕たちだけでは解決できそうになくてさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_014<tab>And so I took it upon myself to reach out to you without his knowledge. For both his sake and the sake of the little one fate has brought into our lives.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_014<tab>それで、マトシャには内緒であなたを呼んだんだよ。
彼と、最近できた「小さな友人」のためにね。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_015<tab>He'll be along soon to sell his most recent catch, which should prove the perfect opportunity to convince him that we require your aid.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_015<tab>そろそろ、マトシャが魚を卸しに来るから、
そのときに、君と引き合わせるのがよさそうだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_016<tab>We'll be sure to catch his attention if we wait outside. Follow me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_016<tab>外で待っていれば彼も気づくだろうし、
とりあえず、場所を移動しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_020<tab>Is that...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Why, I didn't know you and Pasasun were acquainted.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_020<tab>あれ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……？
どうしてパサスーンと一緒にいるだすか！？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_021<tab>(-Talking Bird-)Master Matsya, who is this mighty hunter? <var 08 E905 ((Her)) ((His)) /var> arms are thick, mighty roots, unlike Pasasun's limp seaweed limbs which shrivel in the sun.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_021<tab>(-しゃべる小鳥-)貧弱なパサスーンと違って、とても強そうなお方ですね！
こちらの方も狩人なのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_022<tab>I would have you know that I am an alchemist by trade─I work with my mind, not my body. And need I remind you, it was my knowledge which allowed me to nurse you back to health. Surely a little respect isn't too much to ask...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_022<tab>僕は錬金術師なんだから、腕力がなくても問題ないの。
まったく、君の手当てをがんばった僕に、
もう少し懐いてくれたっていいだろうに……。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_023<tab>By the look on your face, I take it you understood Kalika's commentary. This is the little one I mentioned to you before. In spite of his...forthright nature, Matsya and I have become quite taken with him.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_023<tab>あなたにも、彼の言葉がちゃんと聞こえたみたいだね。
僕のことを貧弱呼ばわりしてくる、あのかわいい小鳥が、
最近できた小さな友人こと「カリカ」だよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_024<tab>I apologize for contacting <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> without consulting you beforehand. I know you didn't want to burden <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> with these troubles, but I'm afraid I see no other recourse.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_024<tab>勝手に連絡しちゃって、ごめんよ。
君は<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>に迷惑をかけたくないって言ってたけど、
いつまでも悩んでいるわけにはいかないと思ってさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_025<tab>Well, since you've come all this way, I suppose it would be foolish of me not to tell you everything. That is, of course, if you would like to hear it?
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_025<tab>じゃあ、せっかく来てもらったわけだし、
ちょっとだけ話を聞いてもらってもいいだすか？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_026<tab>Very well. Several days ago, I found this tiny bird on the shore, breathing faintly and unconscious. Pasasun and I took him in and watched over him day and night, unsure if he would ever awake. For a mercy, he did─and then, to our surprise, he spoke: “Go to the southern isles...”
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_026<tab>何日か前に、浜辺で気を失っているこの小鳥を見つけただす。
パサスーンと介抱して、ようやく目を覚ましたと思ったら、
急にヒトの言葉で「南の島に来てほしい」って……。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_027<tab>What isles are these, you may wonder. Kalika, would you explain?
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_027<tab>カリカ、「南の島」について、
改めて説明してもらってもいいだすか？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_028<tab>Certainly, Master Matsya! Your wish is my command!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_028<tab>はいはい！
吾輩、マトシャ様のお願いなら喜んで！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_029<tab>The “south sea isles,” I believe your kind call them. Remote and mysterious, 'tis said.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_029<tab>ええと、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>でしたっけ？
貴方は、ヒトが「南洋諸島」と呼ぶ、
はるか南の海に点在する島々のことをご存知でしょうか？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_030<tab>I hail from there─from one in the west by the name of Aloalo.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_030<tab>吾輩は、南洋諸島の西側にある群島のひとつ、
「アロアロ島」からまいりました！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_031<tab>It was home to a people thousands of years ago of whom now no trace remains, save for a grand shrine, and the great statue of the Speaker enshrined within.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_031<tab>数千年前、忽然と姿を消したとされる「忘れられた人々」……
島には、彼らが遺したとされる大いなる神子像と、
これを祀る祭祀場がございます。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_032<tab>The statue was embedded with a glorious gemstone which bestowed vitality and beauty to the island. Nowhere else did nature thrive so! Long after the builders vanished, others would cross the sea to bask in this bounty.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_032<tab>その像に据えられた宝玉が持つ「自然を育む力」によって、
島には豊かな環境がつくりだされているのです！
後世に島へ渡ってきたヒトも、その恩恵を受けておりました。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_033<tab>However, a century ago, from the ocean deep roiling flames burst forth, forcing the residents of Aloalo to flee. And so the animals, who no longer had to fear the hunters' arrows, laid claim to the island's gifts.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_033<tab>ところが、100年ほど前に海底火山が噴火したとき、
島民が別の島へと移住してしまいまして……。
森の恵みを得る者も、狩猟をする者もいなくなってしまいました。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_034<tab>As Aloalo healed, ravenous beasts grew plentiful, and the rivers became choked with fish. They breed and feast unchecked, and not even the Speaker's blessing can forestall the island's gradual descent into a barren waste.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_034<tab>おかげで噴火被害の回復に合わせ、鳥や獣、魚たちが急増……。
このままでは、いかに神子像の加護があれども、
植物が喰らい尽くされ、島は荒れ果ててしまうことでしょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_035<tab>As the Speaker's servant, it fell to me to go forth and save my dear home, so I rode the waves upon a floating coconut in search of a mighty hunter!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_035<tab>そこで「神子の使い」たる吾輩は、
島を救う狩人を求め、流れるヤシの実に飛び乗りました！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_036<tab>Although the ocean could have swallowed me whole at any moment, I looked to the horizon without fear. I had faith that the Speaker would guide me true, and I was right! Master Matsya is the very hunter who will save Aloalo!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_036<tab>大海原の旅はつらく厳しく、死を覚悟したことも！
ですが、吾輩は神子様の導きにより、運命の狩人……
そうマトシャ様に出会ったのです！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_037<tab>You see now the source of my distress. The very thought of facing ravenous beasts makes my trunk shiver in fear.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_037<tab>……ということで、島へ来てほしいって言われてるだす。
でも、オラは狩人じゃなくて漁師だし、
危険な動物がいたら手に負えないし……。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_038<tab>But <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> could be the hunter our little friend seeks─and sate your hunger for exploration besides. Admittedly, I did not ask because I thought such a trifling task would be beneath you, but...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_038<tab>あんただったら適任なんじゃないかと考えたけど、
忙しそうだしなぁって、悩んでたわけだす。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_Q2_000_039<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_Q2_000_039<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_A2_000_001<tab>You had me at “grand shrine.”
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_A2_000_001<tab>「神子像の祭祀場」には興味がある

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_A2_000_002<tab>Well, if you went alone, you wouldn't come back...
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_A2_000_002<tab>マトシャが行かないんじゃなぁ……

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_040<tab>If you are as accomplished as Master Matsya says, I would welcome you to Aloalo with open wings! There is one catch, however...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_040<tab>素晴らしい、貴方のように見る目がある方には、
ぜひ島に来ていただきたい！
ですが……

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_041<tab>Your concern for Master Matsya's well-being is plain─and I should be glad to call upon so accomplished a hunter as I am told you are. There is one catch, however...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_041<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、よく言ってくださいました！
吾輩、心の底から同意いたします！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_042<tab>Master Matsya must come, you see. The Speaker guided me into his embrace, and that is a sign I cannot ignore.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_042<tab>神子様の導きである以上、
やはりマトシャ様にもお越しいただかなくてはなりません！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_043<tab>I have ever had a soft spot for small, defenseless creatures. And while I am no man of action, I possess knowledge of the south seas which may put wind in your sails, as it were.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_043<tab>僕、かわいい小動物には弱くてね……。
カリカへの助け舟として、マトシャに耳寄りな情報を伝えようか。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_044<tab>Many of the fish native to the isles are prized for their rare properties and would make a fine gift for any alchemist. Nidhana would be most impressed if you were to brave unknown waters and bring her a few.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_044<tab>南洋諸島の魚には、希少な錬金素材になるものがとても多いんだ。
つまり、君が長年憧れているあのニッダーナに、
最高の贈り物を渡すチャンスじゃない？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_045<tab>A g-g-gift? For...Nidhana!?
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_045<tab>ニ、ニッダーナさんに、オラが贈り物を……！？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_046<tab>Y-Yes, I'll go! I'll go and find the plumpest fish I can find!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_046<tab>わ、わわ、わかっただす！
オラ、その島まで行って、
ニッダーナさんへの贈り物を釣ってくるだす！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_047<tab>As for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it seems I must burden you with my troubles after all. I know it's a lot to ask, but please...travel with me to Aloalo Island!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_047<tab>あの、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……
結局あんたを頼ることになって申し訳ないけど、
改めて、一緒に「アロアロ島」へ行ってほしいだす！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_048<tab>Master Matsya, you wear resolve well! Every moment I become more certain of your success!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_048<tab>マトシャ様、よくぞご決断くださいました……！
吾輩、感動に打ち震えております！！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_049<tab>Now, let us depart before this swell of courage recedes. Aloalo is south from here as the albatross flies. You will know it by the unusually lush canopies!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_049<tab>さあさあ、気が変わらないうちに出発いたしましょう！
目的地は、まっすぐ南へと向かった先にある大きな島です！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_050<tab>No, Kalika, you must stay here. The wounds you suffered have yet to heal.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_050<tab>こらこら、カリカは留守番だよ。
大海原の旅で負傷した羽が、まだ治ってないんだから。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_051<tab>Hmm, rather presumptuous of you to command me thus, but you are right. I can scarcely lift my wings for the pain...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_051<tab>むむ、パサスーンのくせに生意気な。
ですが、羽の不調を指摘されては、返す言葉もございません……。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_052<tab>Fear not. Your instructions were more than clear enough to guide <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and Matsya to Aloalo Island.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_052<tab>サベネア島から南下した先の大きな島、って情報さえあれば、
カリカの案内がなくても、ちゃんとたどり着けるさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_053<tab>Since I can't accompany you, I'll see to the commissioning of a vessel for your voyage. Once you're ready to depart, let us rendezvous at Yedlihmad.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_053<tab>同行できないぶん、沖に出す船の手配は僕が引き受けるよ。
準備ができたら「イェドリマン」で合流しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_JJHIMEI_000_054<tab>(-Energetic Miqo'te Girl-)Did you hear that, Zozone!? A jewel bigger than <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, just waiting for someone to sail to that island and give it a new home!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_JJHIMEI_000_054<tab>(-陽気なミコッテ族の女-)ねぇ～っ、ゾゾネくん聞いた～！？
島にある「神子の宝玉」が、すっごいお宝なんだって！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_ZOZONE_000_055<tab>Can't say I made out every little bit, J'jhimei, but I got the salient points. Treasure in the south sea isles, ripe for the pluckin', aye?
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_ZOZONE_000_055<tab>(-ゾゾネと呼ばれた男-)ミコッテ族ほど、オレの耳はよくねぇっつーの！
まあでも、南洋諸島がどうとか言ってたのは、
聞き違いじゃなかったってワケだな！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_ZOZONE_000_056<tab>Seems you were onto somethin' with this wild chocobo chase, Whasbyrm. Rumors of wild riches rarely pay off this well!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_ZOZONE_000_056<tab>(-ゾゾネと呼ばれた男-)ワスビルム、お手柄じゃねぇか！
お前が仕入れた「南洋諸島の無人島に宝が眠ってる」って噂、
マジもんだったみたいだぜ！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_WHASBYRM_000_057<tab>Aye, but that lot might be after the same thing. We'd be in for some competition...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_WHASBYRM_000_057<tab>(-ワスビルムと呼ばれた男-)いや、でもさぁ、
あの人たちも同業者なら、奪い合いになっちゃうんじゃ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_JJHIMEI_000_058<tab>No need to get your smallclothes in a twist over one fisherman and his hired help! These ears aren't just for show, you know─I heard them spill the exact location!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_JJHIMEI_000_058<tab>(-陽気なミコッテ族の女-)ぶ～っ！　ワスビルムくんてば、弱気すぎ～！
島への行き方は聞こえたし、先回りしてお宝もらっちゃお！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_ZOZONE_000_059<tab>This score smells bigger than the Mealvaan's Gate one. I wager we'll be richer than kings!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_ZOZONE_000_059<tab>(-ゾゾネと呼ばれた男-)メルヴァン税関公社で盗んだ金より、
がっぽり稼げるチャンスは逃せねぇぜ！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_ZOZONE_000_060<tab>Get your gear in order, you two! We're commandeerin' the first skiff we lay eyes on!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_ZOZONE_000_060<tab>(-ゾゾネと呼ばれた男-)おい、ジャ・ジメイ、ワスビルム！
とっとと船を拝借して、出発するぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_061<tab>How cruel to have been entrusted with this sacred duty, yet forced to wait and pray for another's success...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_061<tab>島のことをお願いしているにもかかわらず、
神子の使いたる吾輩が留守番とは……。
不甲斐ないかぎりです。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_BOATER04789_000_062<tab>Pasasun's told me everythin'. I'll see you safely to this island of yours, you have my word!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_BOATER04789_000_062<tab>やあ、話はパサスーンから聞いてるよ！
現地まで安全に送ってやるから、どんと任せておきな！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_065<tab>There you are. Did you spy the commotion on your way here?
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_065<tab>ああ、来てくれたね。
さっきまで、ちょっとした騒ぎになっていて大変だったんだよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_066<tab>It seems a trio of masked scoundrels absconded with one of the smaller ships. The Radiant Host is attempting to track them down, but the sea is vast, and the thieves long gone. Let us give thanks that they did not choose <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> vessel.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_066<tab>なんでも、見ない顔の3人組が船を1隻盗んだみたいでね。
まあ、犯人のことは星戦士団が追っているし、
君たちの乗る船は確保してあるから、安心して大丈夫だよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_067<tab>Ah, yes. Matsya wanted me to tell you that he has returned to Akyaali to wrap up some loose ends with his work while you make ready to depart.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_067<tab>あっと、そうそう。
マトシャは、君の準備が整うまで、
アキャーリへ戻って仕事を片付けておくって。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_068<tab>Now that you've arrived, I shall send word. Kalika and I may be staying behind, but that doesn't mean we can't make ourselves useful.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_068<tab>君の身支度が済んだら、僕が呼んでくるよ。
僕とカリカは留守番だからね、連絡役くらいは任せて。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_069<tab>We've given the skipper directions to Aloalo Island, and she is confident that she can deliver you there without issue. The rest depends on you, my friend.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_069<tab>「イェドリマンの船頭」さんには島の方角を伝えてあるから、
彼女に頼めば、現地まで連れていってくれるよ。
そこから先のことは、どうかよろしく頼むね。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_070<tab>I know you can handle yourself, but still...be careful, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_070<tab>君が腕の立つ人だってことは知っているけど、
どうか気をつけてね。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_071<tab>Full glad I am to see you both returned, and in good health besides!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_071<tab>おふたりが戻られて、
吾輩ホッといたしました！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_075<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Your journey to the island has left you none the worse for wear, I am pleased to see.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_075<tab>おかえり。
無事に帰ってきてくれてよかった。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_076<tab>While I cannot wait to hear the full account, I'm sure you wish to take your ease after such a trying expedition.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_076<tab>さっそく島のことをいろいろ聞きたいところだけど……
座って話せる場所を、マトシャが確保しに行ってくれてね。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_077<tab>Matsya has gone ahead to find a place we can sit and converse in peace. Let us go to him.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_077<tab>ゆっくり話ができるように、
僕たちもそちらへ向かうとしようか。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_078<tab>Now that we're all comfortable, pray tell us of your experiences on Aloalo.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_078<tab>それじゃあ、
島がどんな感じだったかを聞かせてほしいな。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_079<tab>There was danger and death around every corner! Though that rather grim aspect was mitigated somewhat by the incredible beauty...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_079<tab>とにかく危険な島だっただす！
でも、いろいろ見どころが多い場所で……。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_080<tab>The waters surrounding the isle were teeming with fish. My peers might find this bounty tempting, but the number of wrecks on Aloalo's shores made plain the great risk inherent in pursuing it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_080<tab>島周辺の海域も漁場としてよさそうだったし、
漁師仲間にも話してみようかと思ってるところだす。
座礁した船が多かったのは気になるけど……。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_081<tab>The shallows are not so different from those of Thavnair. Like our courageous skipper, I am sure your friends would be better suited than most to brave Aloalo's waters.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_081<tab>島の周辺は浅瀬なものですから、
海が荒れたときには船が座礁することがあるのです。
ここも遠浅ですので、こちらでの漁と勝手は同じかと！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_082<tab>When I spied the towering tree at the island's heart, I was reminded of Khadga! Did the ancient peoples live beneath its boughs?
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_082<tab>島の中心にあった大きな樹は、
ここの「カドガの大岩」ぐらい存在感があってすごかっただす！
大樹のあたりも、昔はヒトが暮らしてたんだすか？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_083<tab>Indeed they did! 'Twas within the welcome shade where wise sages refined complex equations. Not unlike your Great Work, where Pasasun tempers his knowledge of alchemy.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_083<tab>あそこには「算術」を学ぶ者が多くおりましたね！
その熱量たるや、パサスーンが暮らしている、
デミールの遺烈郷とやらに、少し似ていたように思います。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_084<tab>We were making our way through the ruins of a settlement when we were accosted by some sort of faerie. I worry her mocking laughter will haunt my dreams for nights to come.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_084<tab>集落の跡地みたいな場所を通り抜けたあたりで、
いたずらしてくる妖精さんに出くわして……。
本当に、酷い目に遭っただす！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_085<tab>Ah, I know the distasteful creature. She is a creation of others who settled Aloalo long after the ancients had vanished.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_085<tab>とんでもないクソやろ……困った魔法生物がご迷惑を……。
あれは、忘れられた人々が去って長い年月を経たのち、
新たに島へ住み着いた者たちが生み出したのです。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_086<tab>The travelers came from a distant land called Nym, a once-prosperous nation that was in its twilight. They sought refuge in the southern isles, for they had once been home to their forebears, they claimed.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_086<tab>彼らは「ニーム」という場所からやってきたのだとか。
そこが滅んでしまったことをきっかけとして、
祖先の故郷である南洋諸島へ戻ったと言っておりましたね。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_087<tab>We managed to reach the shrine you described. As I stepped into the quiet grove, all my fears were washed away...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_087<tab>祭祀場の神聖な雰囲気は衆園の森に似てて、
心が落ち着くような、居心地のよさを感じただす。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_088<tab>But that tranquility was shattered when the statue attacked us! If <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> hadn't been there to smash it into submission, I wouldn't be standing before you now.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_088<tab>でも、像が暴れ出したときは生きた心地がしなかっただす！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が倒してくれて助かったけど、
どうして動き出したのか……。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_089<tab>The Speaker attacked you!? I have never heard of such a thing!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_089<tab>えっ、神子像が動いたのですか！？
そのような話、聞いたことがございません。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_090<tab>Perhaps it had something to do with the sacred jewel the statue holds. Hmm... It seems there are mysteries whose answers even I do not know.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_090<tab>かの像が持つ「神子の宝玉」と関係があるのかもしれませんが、
「神子の使い」たる吾輩にも知らないことが多く……。
むむむ、気になるところですね。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_091<tab>It was a journey full of twists, turns, and fish besides. I'm glad I was...compelled to embark upon it with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but gladder still to be home.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_091<tab>ともかく、島ではすごい体験ができただす。
でも、いろいろ大変な目にも遭ったし、あそこで釣りはもう……。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_092<tab>Ah, but I trust you understand this was but the first of many, yes? A single hunt will not suffice to keep Aloalo's many predators in check.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_092<tab>マトシャ様、そう仰らずに……！
出発前にもお伝えしておりますとおり、
今のアロアロ島には狩人の存在が不可欠なのです！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_093<tab>Do not forget its waters are teeming with fish rare and remarkable─all of which would make fine gifts for your dear Nidhana. So please, you must promise me that this expedition will not be your last!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_093<tab>それに、薬効豊かな魚がたくさん生息している島ですから、
ニッダーナ様への贈り物には事欠きません……！
どうかもう少し、お力を貸してください！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_094<tab>Y-Yes, of course...but I wouldn't dare brave Aloalo alone...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_094<tab>うーん、それを言われると……。
いやでも、あんな危ない場所にまた行くなんて、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>がいないと無理だし……。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_095<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I hate to impose upon you further, but I would be most grateful to have your resolute company again. For Kalika and Nidhana both!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_095<tab>あんたが忙しいのはわかってるけど、
カリカもこう言ってるし、ニッダーナさんに喜んでほしい……。
どうか、またあの島に同行してほしいだす！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_100_095<tab>Oh, thank you, thank you! With luck, your appetite for adventure will be sated. I know mine own will be a thousand times over.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_100_095<tab>ありがとう、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
やっぱりあんたは、頼りになるだす。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_096<tab>I only hope other “treasure hunters” haven't caught wind of the island's many curiosities. Those ruffians we faced and the wooden beast they set upon us were complications I'd rather not contend with again.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_096<tab>でも、島で遭遇した盗賊みたいなヒトは何だったんだか……。
よくわからない「動く木像」をけしかけてきて、迷惑だっただす。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_097<tab>People, in Aloalo? How odd...to say nothing of this “wooden beast.” To command such constructs requires an intimate knowledge of arcanima...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_097<tab>むむっ、アロアロ島にヒトがいて、しかも動く木像を？
島にそういった木像があるにはあるものの、
あれは、巴術の心得がないと扱えなかったはず……

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_100_097<tab>Perhaps these thieves you encountered were a step above common riffraff. Perhaps they lurked in shadow as I spoke carelessly of Aloalo's secrets!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_100_097<tab>ともかく、島に住民と呼べるようなヒトがいないのは事実。
にもかかわらず、そのような不届き者がいたとすれば、
吾輩たちの会話を盗み聞きしたのかもしれません！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_098<tab>The stolen ship from before... I'll report this to the Radiant Host just in case Kalika's hunch is correct.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_098<tab>そうなると、船を盗んだ犯人っていう可能性もありそうだね。
念のため、星戦士団に報告しておくよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_100_098<tab>Thank you, Pasasun.
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_100_098<tab>よろしく頼むだす。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_100_099<tab>Whoever they are, we must see them in chains before they defile my home again! Oh, if only my wings were healed, I would give them a buffeting they would not soon forget!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_100_099<tab>これ以上、そのヒトたちが島で悪さをしないよう、
速やかに捕縛していただかなくては……！
吾輩の翼でもって、顔をはたいてやりたいぐらいです！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_099<tab>Now, enough talk of adventure. I'd best get this fish to Nidhana before it spoils!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_099<tab>それじゃあ、島の話はこのくらいにして、
オラはニッダーナさんへ釣果を届けに行くだす！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_100_099<tab>Now, enough talk of adventure. My fish won't sell themselves.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_100_099<tab>それじゃあ、島の話はこのくらいにして、
オラはそろそろ仕事へ戻るだす。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_100<tab>Now, enough talk of adventure. The shrine's waters yielded a fish I've never seen before, and I'd like to show it to the other fishmongers. They might know something of its nature.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_MATSYA_000_100<tab>それじゃあ、島の話はこのくらいにして……。
祭祀場で釣ったのは見慣れない魚だったから、
ひとまず漁師仲間に話を聞いてみるだす。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_101<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, for everything─especially for keeping Matsya safe.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_101<tab>改めて、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
今回は来てくれて本当にありがとう。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_100_101<tab>For my part, I must write down your tale before it fades from my memory. Who knows, my records may prove useful when next you visit Aloalo Island.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_100_101<tab>アロアロ島にまつわる情報は、僕が手記にまとめておくから、
また島へ渡るときにでも、役立ててもらえたら嬉しいよ。
書き終えたら共有するからさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_102<tab>I take it you'll be returning to Old Sharlayan soon. When you do, please give Shallow Moor my regards.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_102<tab>このあとオールド・シャーレアンへ戻る予定があるなら、
君と繋いでくれた「シャロー・ムアー」さんによろしく伝えて。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_103<tab>Nidhana seems to have won Kalika's respect sight unseen, while <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> he looks down his beak at me. How vexing...
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_103<tab>僕は相変わらず呼び捨てなのに、
ニッダーナ「様」かぁ……カリカに好かれるのは難しいね。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_104<tab>But I suppose that's neither here nor there. If you're on your way to Old Sharlayan, please be sure to give my thanks to Shallow Moor.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_PASASUN_000_104<tab>まあ、それはともかく。
このあとオールド・シャーレアンへ戻る予定があるなら、
君と繋いでくれた「シャロー・ムアー」さんによろしく伝えて。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_105<tab>Anyone who is dear to Master Matsya is dear to me. I would bow my head to Mistress Nidhana!
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_KALIKA_000_105<tab>ふふん！
マトシャ様の想い人でいらっしゃる方ですから、
ニッダーナ様はもちろん様付けでお呼びしますとも！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_110<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> returns! I trust this means Pasasun and Matsya's troubles have been resolved to their satisfaction?
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_110<tab>おっかえり～！
もしかして、パサスーンさんの依頼が終わったのかな？

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_111<tab>The south sea isles? Ah, would that I could have been there to walk amidst such verdant beauty! I daresay I'm <var 1A 02 /var>green<var 1A 01 /var> with envy.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_111<tab>ええっ、南洋諸島まで行ってきたの！？
私、植物専門のグリーナーだから、
あのあたりの植生に興味湧いちゃうなぁ～！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_112<tab>Your Arkasodara friend sounds like he made for fine company, too. To brave mysterious wilds in search of fish for your beloved─the stakes turned out to be far higher than I realized.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_112<tab>それに、憧れの人のために薬効のある魚を釣りたいなんて、
マトシャさんが健気すぎて、応援せずにはいられないわ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_100_112<tab>In any event, while any “obligation” to Matsya has arguably been met, I encourage you to aid him in his quest for new and exciting fish. Who knows what dazzling specimens are yet waiting to be discovered in the waters of Aloalo Island?
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_100_112<tab>変則依頼としてはこれで終了ってことにはなるけど、
もう少し彼を手伝ってもらえると、私としても嬉しいなぁ～！
希少な錬金素材は、思わぬ発見に繋がることもあるしね！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_100_113<tab>Oh, and if you can spare a moment for Osmon, he will doubtless be eager to hear all about your experience as well.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_100_113<tab>さて、オスモンくんがあなたのお土産話を待ち構えてるから、
た～っぷりと聞かせてあげて！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_113<tab>Cheers to an odd job well done!
target: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SHALLOWMOOR_000_113<tab>それじゃ、お仕事おつかれさまでした～！

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Aloalo Conservation Record<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> is now available within the V&C Dungeon Finder in the Duty section of the main menu.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>メインコマンドの「コンテンツ情報」項目にある、
「特殊ダンジョン探索」内に、
「アロアロ島 探索記」が追加されました。

source: TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>New entries will be added to the log as you complete each possible route through the variant dungeon.
target:
TEXT_AKTKVA301_04789_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>ヴァリアントダンジョン「アロアロ島」コンプリート時、
踏破したルートに応じて、探索記の項目が追加されていきます。
